category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_automatic_load_merge
preference.preference_description: Controls whether the Load Merge process runs automatically, without having to start merge from the CATIA toolbar. Possible values : Yes = Run the Load Merge process automatically when the top level is already opened. Display an error message when the Load Merge cannot be performed. No = Display an error message when the top level is already open. In this case, merge must be started from the CATIA toolbar. Question = Display a prompt when the top level is already opened, asking to perform a Load Merge automatically. Display an error message when the Load Merge cannot be performed
